description: This file defines a React component named 'Summary' that renders a presentation view of Kanban columns with drag-and-drop reordering, fullscreen toggle, and column collapsing features. It manages UI state, local storage persistence, and user interactions for a Kanban board summary page.

methods.name: Summary
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the Kanban summary view with drag-and-drop, fullscreen, and column collapse features.

methods.name: DraggableSummaryColumn
methods.description: A sub-component representing each draggable and collapsible column in the summary view.

methods.name: getStatusDotColor
methods.description: Utility function to determine the color of the status dot based on card status.

methods.name: getStatusClass
methods.description: Utility function to map card status to CSS class for styling.
